body_html: It looks like the kernel backing tf.Variable isn't registered for tf.bool on GPU devices. See the use of TF_CALL_GPU_NUMBER_TYPES() to register the kernel for different types here, and note that the macro's definition here doesn't include bool.
body_text: It looks like the kernel backing tf.Variable isn't registered for tf.bool on GPU devices. See the use of TF_CALL_GPU_NUMBER_TYPES() to register the kernel for different types here, and note that the macro's definition here doesn't include bool.
body: It looks like the kernel backing `tf.Variable` isn't registered for `tf.bool` on GPU devices. See the use of `TF_CALL_GPU_NUMBER_TYPES()` to register the kernel for different types [here](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/b93fd37e143bcdd6339f8e6081c948384a262e0b/tensorflow/core/kernels/variable_ops.cc#L85), and note that the macro's definition [here](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/b93fd37e143bcdd6339f8e6081c948384a262e0b/tensorflow/core/framework/register_types.h#L171) doesn't include `bool`.
